thread.title: Report: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Badly Hurt in ATV Accident
thread.title_full: Report: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Badly Hurt in ATV Accident

author: Just Jared
title: Report: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Badly Hurt in ATV Accident
text:
Reportedly, Jamie Lynn Spears ‘ daughter, Maddie , was airlifted to the hospital on Sunday (Feb. 5).
TMZ reported that 8-year-old Maddie — who was on a hunting expedition — was riding a Polaris off road vehicle, when it flipped. Jamie Lynn — who is Britney Spear ‘s younger sister — was not with her daughter when the accident occurred.
Maddie ‘s condition is reported to be extremely serious. 
Our thoughts go out to Jamie Lynn and the Spears family at this scary time.
We’ll keep you posted on Maddie ‘s condition.
